system.useTime: Summoning a Daemon requires performing a Daemonic Summoning Ritual and succeeding a Daemonic Mastery Test. As seen elsewhere.
system.novice: Scales, bony plates, insectoid carapace, living metal, or some other form coats the Daemonhost's flesh. They gain the Natural Armour (5) Trait.

description.value: Novice: Scales, bony plates, insectoid carapace, living metal, or some other form coats the Daemonhost's flesh. They gain the Natural Armour (5) Trait.
